title: Saar Biotech - Promethazine Hydrochloride Suspension|Saar Biotech- Contract Manufacturing Company Pharmaceuticals
meta: Saar Biotech is a pharmaceutical company which is situated in Himachal Pradesh(Baddi).The combination of Promethazine Suspension is used used as an antiallergic, in pruritus, for motion sickness and sedation, and also in animals.
